code: import React from"react";import"./CartItemCard.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CartItemCard=_ref=>{let{item,deleteCartItems}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"CartItemCard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:"ssa"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(item.product),children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Price: \u20B9".concat(item.price)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{onClick:()=>deleteCartItems(item.product),children:"Remove"})]})]});};export default CartItemCard;
